events.title: Regularization in Imaging Science
events.author: Prof. Byung-Woo Hong
events.annotation: In this tutorial I will present an adaptive regularization scheme for optimizing a composite energy functionals arising in image analysis. The adaptive regularization scheme is designed to balance data fidelity and regularization depending on the current data fit during the iterative optimization, so that regularization is strongest initially and wanes as data fidelity improves. The adaptive regularization algorithm can be applied to a variety of imaging applications such as reconstruction, segmentation and registration.
events.organization: Computer Science Department, Chung-Ang University, Seoul, Korea

events.title: Digitalization of digital media: a shift in human-device interaction that will reshape the concept of media industry
events.author: Самсонов Максим Станиславович
events.annotation: We analyze the applicability of the term digitalization to modern television and justify  the concept of digitalization of digital media as a transformation of user experience towards control of converged media realm from new environment created by portable devices, voice assistants and emerging emotional interfaces.

events.title: Challenging Issues in Development and Integration of Modern Kinematics with Components and Images Obtained from Different Sources in Biomechanical Applications
events.author: Гутман Евсей Израилевич
events.annotation: Challenging Issues in Development and Integration of Modern Kinematics with Components and Images Obtained from Different Sources in Biomechanical Applications.

events.title: Pravega
events.author: Павел Липский
events.annotation: На семинаре Павел Липский (Ведущий инженер-разработчик ПО в Dell Technologies) познакомит слушателей с концепцией потоков и open-source проектом Pravega. Павел расскажет об Apache Flink, компонентах и развертывании Pravega, а также покажет демо сервиса.
